title: Emotionally Yours
album: Bob Dylan - The 30th Anniversary Concert Celebration
lyrics:
Baby, I'm yours
Yours, baby, baby, yours
Yours, I just wanna be yours

Come baby, find me, come baby
Remind me of where I once begun
Come baby, show me, show me you know me
Tell me you're the one

And I could be learning, you could be yearning
To see behind closed doors

But I will always be emotionally yours
Wanna be, gonna be, wanna be emotionally yours
Gonna be, gonna be, gonna be emotionally
I just wanna be emotionally yours
All yours

Come baby, rock me (Rock me)
Come on baby and lock me
Into the shadows of your heart
Come baby, teach me (Teach me)
Come baby and reach me
Let the music start (Let the music start)

Hey, and I could be dreaming, I keep believing
You're the one I'm livin' for

I will always be emotionally yours
Wanna be, gonna be, wanna be emotionally yours
Gonna be, gonna be, gonna be emotionally
I just wanna be emotionally yours

It's like my whole life never happened
When I see you, it's as if I never had a thought
I know this dream, it might be crazy
But it's the only one I've got (It's the only one)
It's the only one I've got, oh
Come baby, shake me
Come baby, take me
I would be satisfied

I will always be emotionally yours
Wanna be, gonna be, wanna be emotionally yours
Gonna be, gonna be, gonna be emotionally yours
Gonna be, gonna be, gonna be emotionally
I just wanna be emotionally yours

I will always be emotionally yours
I will always be emotionally yours
I will always be emotionally yours
I will always be emotionally yours
